reviews_data.review_text: I still love walking into a real bookstore and handling real books, even in this, the Digital Age. B&N had been at this location since I was very young and I love to go in and browse any chance I get. Great place, awesome staff.
Good selection of books and media even if it can be a tad messy from time to time.
Great selections and the staff was friendly.

Drew was GREAT. I had recently been given a BN gift card and I didn't really have an idea of what to get since I haven't been an avid reader for years. I absentmindedly asked for a book I've heard good things about. Drew showed me where it was, said he loved it and would be happy to give similar recommendations. I told him no thanks at first but after a while of failing to find anything that piqued my interest, I searched for him again and asked for his opinions. He proceeded to give a good 10 minute in depth talk about horror books he loves and what he thinks might appeal to me; I grabbed a particularly interesting sounding book he recommended  and he was kind enough to reduce it 50% as a Christmas gift. It was nice to see someone talk so passionately, especially when it's something related to their field of work. Days later and I cannot put these books down (Drew knows his stuff)
Everyone here is always super helpful, and they almost always have books we're looking for in stock. My daughter loves to hang out there.
Can always find something for the whole family!

Drove a long way to this location. After having spoken to a young man yesterday, who went above and beyond to walk the store and find the books I was looking for. He explained what each book looked like and what was inside. These were 5 cookbooks. I didn't ask him to hold them as I wasn't sure when I would get up there. Today I went up there early Gabby was amazingly helpful. She found these 5 books for me and helped me look for some special children's books. She was patient, kind and respectful. Then it ended up she checked me out as well. So not only is her customer service impeccable she is clearly a go getter and great at multi tasking. Both if these young people deserve a raise and Gabby should be in management training if she isn't already.
Only big chain bookstore left. That is scary ! I hope they are around for a long, long time.

My favorite B&N to visit aside from the one in Pineville; they're always super sweet and it's a gorgeous store. Really well maintained and has a great selection. It's a lot bigger than it looks on the outside, and I love visiting when I get a chance.
great hot chocolate and a great variety of toys for the holidays

If I could give 0 star to their Starbucks I could... they are so racist and I buy a venti caramel latte and the girl didn't close the top properly. When I got out off the store my coffee spilled, I went back to the store immediately with the cup, telling them my incident and their manager to me "we are not responsible for any incident of spilled coffee outside our store"with a strong attitude. üôÑüôÑ
A transplant from laaaarge city. Having said that, no B&N can compete. A lot of everything in a small space. OK so Charlotte doesn't spend time reading. I will go back only game in town.
Totally enjoyed browsing around and liming in the relaxed atmosphere and they have an excellent selection of books and gifts for book lovers
I've been going here for a while. They usually have what I'm looking for. Staff is nice

I recently attended a Nicholas Sparks book signing at this location. I was thoroughly impressed by the coordination and timely manner of the signing! It was a very well organized event! A neat bookstore with cafe in the center!
How long since you were last in a bookstore? Probably too long. Great selection.
The cashier Sylvia was extremely rude.

I love Barnes & Noble, but I have never seen the store in such disarray as I did today. I understand they were resetting part of the Mystery section, but a sign informing customers of this would have been helpful. Also in U. S. History I found books on Jimmy Carter shelved with books on Abe Lincoln, and it was not a section on presidential biography.

Used to love going here for years , until I realized one of the staff is racist. My hispanic family approached to check out and the cashier who was being kind to the current customer finished the transaction of said customer and proceeded to walk away in that moment and whispered to my (15 year old sister who was approaching to pay  ) mixed b*** (My sister is hispanic but very light skinned ). The lady was an older white lady. She was so scared she didn't tell me right away until now, even though the whole ordeal was extremly strange and rude in the moment. The next cashier came and took our purchase. Her face visably changed. She seemed uncomfortable. Now i think she may have heard what her coworker said. I am extremely appalled and angry . Will be going again to identify if this lady is still there and make a formal complaint. I am disgusted. My sister is extremely shy and never goes up to pay for herself and the first time she does, this happens l. I have been going for years and this has never happened. I know there is good people who work there but I hope the coworker reported her for gross inappropriate behavior and to a child no less.
Staff were extremely helpful in finding certain books that I was looking for and couldn't find.

I had a great customer service at Starbucks barista lady she wears glasses and hat a beautiful smile, kindness and make me feel so warm and caring I made a wrong order coffee for my daughter and she was so so kind her words ‚Äúno worries my dear‚Äù were so sweet I feel embarrassed not knowing the coffee order, and she smiled at me and give me another not charge me again! I really hope we have more people like her around us! Also Harry Potter secci√≥n was so cute and perfect! I always back here even now we move a little far away from this store.  :-)
Very neat, organized, and with plenty of people ready to help.
I like the store a lot better than the one at South Park everybody in this store seems to be nice and willing to help good selection of books and great prices
Store is great, employees were nice. Those bathrooms OMG!!!!

It shouldn't take 15 minutes to check out when there are only 3 people in front of me. This is why brick and mortar businesses are failing. Note I've seen 5 people doing other things besides checking people out.

I see in your star trek magazines about new star trek novels but you never put any new star trek novels our like you do with star wars. I can't get new star trek novels as long as you don't put new ones out
Great customer service and you will find anything book or music related.
Got so much help today in the Manga section picking out books for the kids!
It's a nice single story Barnes and Noble with a good size children's section.
People are helpful and friendly. The books are expensive.
Good coffee and an  employee found and brought me to my book in under a minute of asking about it.

First time there it was the GREATEST experience ever the professionalism, cleanliness, and knowledge of the books I asked about was right on point..Sorry I don't remember names. But is for ALL the employees I met.
Fantastic atmosphera of good books! I've enjoyed coffee and books there. Thank you!
Nice bookstore, good selection of books in different genres. Good new age type  books and cards!
Even if I cannot find exactly what I am looking for, there is always someone who is willing to help. Sometimes I gotta wait for help but that's not a terrible thing when they're helping others.

The quality of service in the cafe has dropped significantly. The younger workers lack common customer service skills. They used to ask for your name and call out your name when your order is ready. They did not do that today. And I received my sandwich in a bag????? Never asked if I was dining in. Not the service I'm accustomed to here.
üèÜ

Cozy place. Teen section is somehow combined with young adult. They say 13-18 is considered young adult--- I don't think teens are equivalent to young adults so that needs to be revamped because majority of the books in that section are inappropriate for young teens. Starbucks gets 10 stars! Cafe staff was very attentive & kind!
(Translated by Google) Excellent atention.  (Original) Muy buena atenci√≥n.
Cafe AND bookstore workers were so nice, complimented my outfit and gave me notes on the book I was buying! I wish I didn't live 30 minutes away or I'd be a regular there!
could use more space devoted to books.
great place to have a coffee and read a good book
Staff is Super helpful & knowledgeable!

It was a cozy place to shop in, not just to buy books and other stuff but also to enjoy reading near by their inside coffee shop they have.  I loved the variation of book genres they have, in fact they do have mangas which I'm very into it, also they have a whole section for Harry Potter, a section in Spanish in which I bought a couple of books for my sister among others.
Great place and the coffee was awesome
They didn't have the book I wanted to buy (very popular book) and then messed up my shipping information.

Nice place to study, Starbucks inside of store is always a plus. The tables are quite small, and charging ports are only able to be used my tables on the coners, but overall, very nice and quiet place to study.
The bookseller who assisted me used every resource available to her, including her own cellphone, to help me identify a book whose name and author I could not recall. But, she did it!
Bookstores are amazing! Thank you Barnes and Noble for surviving the technological takeover.
Great selection of books plus nicely displayed.Pleasant helpful personnel.
always love visiting and shopping there.!
Such pleasant atmosphere and people even in the height of holiday shopping.
The employees were very nice
–≠—Ç–æ –ë–∞—Ä–Ω–∑ –Ω –ù–æ–±–ª, —á—Ç–æ?!  (Translated by Google) It's Barnes n Noble, what?!
It was good.
Staff very knowledgeable and helpful.
Great selection
I was waiting for my car to be repaired and stopped by to peruse some books. It's always a nice place to go, drink a cup of Starbucks and breathe.
Nicholas Sparks book tour was very organized and this line moved quickly. It was wonderfully done! Great Event!!
Very helpful and friendly staff.
Great place to pick up a book or 12 or to go kill a few hours with a bit of cheesecake and a hot chocolate.
Great store
Good location, bathrooms not clean. The book selections are limited as this is not a mega store
Staff friendly and eager to assist.
Got the book I wanted.
friendly associates, clean, excellent selection. one could get lost in the stacks, exploring the variety.

As one of the last brick and mortar stores, this Barnes & Noble does thrive with customers and a coffee shop in the center of the store. Hopefully I hope it remains a place where you can physically browse books and purchase them. They also have a variety of items for gifts throughout the year.
It's b and n
Had exactly what we were looking for, and that was a specific Lego set! Lots of board games too. Nice to see. Grabbed a coffee on the way out!

The guy Rodge at the Cafe is very rude. Ignored a paying customer, as a I stood waiting to purchasean item.  I guess task is more important than customer service. You approach a customer for assistance not yell across "What do you need?" Wow!
Nice place

Barnes & Noble has always been one of my favorite places. I love books and the new book smell is always exciting! The atmosphere is also great, you can sit down and have a coffee and read a magazine or a book and it's always such a welcoming place.
Very helpful and friendly
My husband and I love to read.  We go there almost Every Sunday to get a refreshing drink with Raj, who Always lifts our spirits, peruse the books and get something Good to Read.
The place only has Obama books on display and it looks likes it's going out of business.
(Translated by Google) There are good books in Spanish  (Original) Hay buenos libros en espa√±ol
Wasn't crowded with nice atmosphere
Staff was extremely helpful and a joy to chat with.
Friendly associates. The associate in the cafe was extremely kind and made my day. Any bookstore is my go to place, but this Barnes and Noble has always been a favorite.

Fantastic selection and super helpful staff. Went in looking to purchase the Mistborn Trilogy and was helped by Drew. He knew exactly where they were and had even read them himself. He was very knowledgeable about the subject and even had a recommendation for a future series. Started that series yesterday and it's fantastic so far! 10/10 Drew deserves a raise
Great staff
The girl in Barnes and Nobles was really awesome they really were trying to find us the books we needed
Best place for books and spend time exercising our brain. Kids have cool play area !! Love this store
Less content than they previously had, but great to browse.
Amazing customer service! They will help you find anything you are looking for.

Decent inventory of books that was unavailable last year. One particular woman staff with glasses and headband barged in to ask uncomfortable questions is not what I am accustomed to seasoned long time bookshoper at Barns and Noble locations! Ignorant nosey prying staff like barge in while you stand and reading, which is completely normal for others when it was not even busy hour and had lots of space around, staff should not bother when a person is not looking for help with a book location in which case we know better to find where to find privacy-not-invasive staff at the center area where there had been a staff(s) for general inquiry.
I love bookstores...what more can I say?

Not open when they claim they are open. Sign said open, hours of operation said they were open for a couple more hours still. There even was a couple of customers walking inside even, though it was mostly empty. But they locked their doors without explanation and wasted our time traveling. So they lost business to Amazon.
Great customer service
Always a great atmosphere. Never overly crowded.
Booooks!!!!!!
Nice variety of shops and not growded.
Great real life book store. Can't beat that.
Love Barnes & Noble always great book on sale
Went in for an Air Fryer Cookbook. They had about 100 cookbooks, not one for an Air Fryer. So, I left empty handed.
Could spend hours here.
Super helpful staff and fabulous store
The place was clean and easy to find what I wanted

The manager was extremely offensive and unprofessional. We were looking for cookbooks and apparently other customers were causing a disruption, but his yelling over the store sound system was beyond disturbing.
Best place to spend time finding good reading material and a great cup of coffee. Also   customer service is practiced  daily.  Simply the best place to find your next "read".
Best bookstore in South Charlotte Staff are amazing
Every time I go in there seems to be less books, more games, puzzles and other gifts.

Great selection of books and journals!
Love a book store but no browsing. Just popped in for a 2021 calendar as 2020 sucked.

Watch-out! This place is run by merciless mask-Nazis.  I was told that I must wear my mask between sips of coffee.

Always has great service and a great selection.
Awesome selection of magazines and a great place to hang out!
My children love this place.

It's just not very warm and friendly ever since "Covid" affected how they do things and of course  there is no seating other than the coffee bar area. Not one person that worked there spoke to me and I was there looking around for at least 30 minutes.  Very disappointing.
Ordered online and picked up my items in store. The employees were very helpful and friendly. Would definitely recommend this location.
Had atlas I needed
Very clean, nice drink bar in the center of location. Great selection of memorabilia and collectibles. Staff was helpful and knowledgeable. Great selection of discount books.

Very helpful staff. Found the book we were looking for and ordered the second copy I needed for my twins. Social distancing in place with plexiglass partitions during checkout. Felt safe with all of the precautionary measures taken.

Stores and absolute rack they don't have anything looks like there shutting down business and the staff is rude because the only thing I care about is wearing a face mask I really had my temperature taken once today I don't need people treat me like I'm a disease with feet and not giving people my money you don't treat me the way I deserve to be treated If that's how they do business and they don't seem to understand that the money comes from the customers not the employer than Unemployment is the next stop Sentences temporary solution that doesn't solve anything they might want to think about that no one else in the store bothered me except for the 1 person I ask for help who couldn't help me but wanted to insult me instead
I like to support brick and mortar when I can. These guys need an easier way to find a book in-store, but otherwise, I love going there.
My son got a book and my daughter got a cookie. Both left happy.
So good to go into a place and meet employees who have a passion for reading and books. Very knowledgeable about the older books that I was looking for.
Great vibe, good selection, and very helpful associates.
Barnes and Noble is my favorite place.
Great book store
Love bookstores and this one is laid out very well. Enjoy sitting at the coffee shop area which is right in the middle of everything

There's always a line all the way to entrance, sometimes longer & ALWAYS only 1 check out person. I order online for in store pick up (they advertise curbside pick up but when you call, you're told the store is open & to come inside...to wait in line....with just 1 person working check out ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è...), it would be nice to have a separate line just for prepaid pick ups since they're not going to honor the curbside pick up option. All this to say, make time to come to the Arboretum B&N ~ there is no sense of hurry or urgency at this location. Otherwise, I'd give them 5 stars.

Who doesn't love this book store. Shop here so it will stay in business!!! Even if the book is cheaper online, you have to wait for it - so buy it here instead :-)  BN is a neat place to go browse around, buy book or gift and have a snack.
Always a great place for games for the kids.

Great customer service and all that. Just the books are pricey. You would do better to buy the electronic version of whatever it is you are looking for. Did get a free Starbucks coffee with our receipt. Since there is a Starbucks inside that was pretty cool. Still, tho, you know.

Wonderful experience thanks to Sylvia! I had some trouble with an online order and she went above and beyond to make it right. I've always loved this location, and visit at least 2-3 times a month. I will continue to be a loyal customer.
There were numerous homeless people sleeping in the chairs for paying guests in the middle of the day????!!!!
I encourage people to go in the brick-and-mortar stores
Best vibes in the area. Friendly helpful book enthusiasts!
Good book collection but little costly $$$
Excellent selection.  Clean and well stocked.  Hard to find a sit for two inside on a Sunday afternoon, I guess they have free WiFi.
Big selection, but books are expensive.
Enjoyable and inviting place to spend an afternoon if you're a bibliophile!  A warm aura in the place that brings one back again and again.
Staff was helpful and was able to get what I needed quickly
Good selection.
Great place
Nice and quiet!

We love barnes and noble- they never disappoint. I enjoy nestling in a good seat and reading a book. I particularly enjoy taking my little ones and letting them explore through their favorite aisles. I never leave without a book or a strategy board game for us play at home.
Books, books & more books!
Okay but pricey very sorry to say.
Love BN.
There's nothing like the real thing. A real book, real coffee, and a really good read.
Annoyed that you can't use your own tumbler for coffee. Employee said it's policy.
Love this place! Friendly service.
Barnes & Noble is one of best place to go and indulge in reading. They also have weekend story tell sessions for kids, my daughter use to enjoy it alot.

I wish they gave more coupons online and in stores. Books, especially kids books, are really expensive. I have five children and I spend 100.00 dollars in this place like I am buying coffee. Its a nice location. Lots of traffic, which I hate, and a very cluttered book store. They could really use more seating.
Great customer service
Staff was incredibly helpful while we were picking up some vinyl records.

I loved this place...it has lots of books.. different sections e.g. science, fiction, novels, history what not?? Thes place is really busy but we'll organized..each section has organizely equipped with books! This place serves Starbucks coffee, so you can enjoy sitting inside the bookstore and having relaxing coffee.. stuffs are really friendly and helpful...
Overpriced but great service.
Good

Books!  Love books!
The staff were helpful and friendly, and the book selection is great. The store was large and well organized.
Great layout! Love the Starbucks inside!
Nice location not to much notice from the people that go in there, but the music was a little bit loud.
Great Barnes and Noble. Nice cafe and very quiet.  Friendly and helpful staff.  I ordered the quiche and a pretzel and both were pretty tasty for the money.  Good place to study or unwind.
This Barnes and Noble is awesome the employees always go above and beyond.  Lexi was EXTREMELY helpful
Me and my kids love to go to this library.
Very limited selection and the books are atleast 20 dollars more than any other retailer out there. Its tough not to compare and still go ahead and buy knowing you are over paying.
This location always brings back memories, and the staff is always so nice and helpful. This store is special. I hope it always stays.
Walked in friendly staff member took me to the book I was looking for.  They also gift wrapped my purchase. Great service.
So Much Fun!!!!
Great place to study. Love going here. Everyone is always friendly and helpful.

Outstanding bookstore...and they have a starbucks onsite! **Tip - well behaved pets are welcome as long as they are on a leash or in a pet carrier! Hey, my dog loves to read with me...how about yours?

Ellisa was our barista and she did a wonderful job. Not only was she quick at whipping up the best PSL I've had all season she was also very customer oriented. I wish her manager was there so I could have recommended her for an accolade!  Thanks again Ellisa!

Loved it visiting from Asheville.We don't have nearly the amount of merchandise that they have in this store in Asheville it was very refreshing .üòä  . As I head back to Asheville I will ponder happy thoughts on my great experience at Barnes & Noble Charlotte Yeah!!!üòÄüòÄ See you guys in a couple of months.üòÄüòÄ
Kid area is well organized
Great products and even better customer service!
Good books and magazines

This Barnes & Noble location is very cool.  You go inside here and you will see this wonderful cafe right in the center.  there are plenty of spots in here to find yourself a table and sit and study or work on things.  This location is also in the very cool Mathews Arboretum shopping center.
Starbucks is always good. Quiet environment, good selection. Could use more election of hockey books üòÅ

Brits abroad visiting daughter and grandchildren in Charlotte. We've travelled to Charlotte about 5 or 6 times now and lived locally for 2/3 weeks at a time.  On this occasion, we brought our supposedly sick, off school but very sparky grandchildren to Barnes & Noble to get them some books.  Ably assisted by Margy at this store, we tried to interest our fiesty 5 year old in some books. He could pretty much read everything Margy tried him with for his age group, yet every suggestion Margy made was greeted with a 'No' when it came to a buying decision. Eventually we bought the books he wanted and our older lad, meantime, had chosen just what he wanted.  We repaired to the coffee shop for refreshments and sat with our drinks, having made our purchases. We found the whole experience to be really good and I can say that I was pretty impressed by the quality of service we received from Barnes and Noble staff.  All in all? A great bookshop with plenty to choose from.
Near everything, great book selection
Barnes and Noble Arboretum is a great place. The staff is very friendly and helpful.  They are great at working with the schools and providing books that are needed for classes.
Always the place to go for a new read and a coffee with a baked good or sandwich

Barnes and Noble has a tendency to have senior /elder crumpy managers still trying to hold onto a job that they are no longer congenial enough to do! I know because I am a senior and they've been crumpy and short with me don't appreciate it thank goodness not all of them are crumpy seniors.
Great place
Definitely one of the better Barnes & Noble stores! You can tell that the staff cares about the store and what they do.
Great children's section. My kids love it here
Excellent bookstore and great customer service
Always enjoy the great service and book quality!!
Very good coffee.  Just the way I like it . Very good and friendly staff .
Great selections especially for children

Always pleasant,helpful,the place to go for new booksüòä

Great place to sit and read. Really need to make available again Reclaim magazine, BBC Gardening magazine and BBC Food magazine. UK magazines are so much more informative and interesting than  most of the magazines in these categories printed from the US. Oh, I am from the US.
Nice store.

I visit B&N often and always enjoy the search for something new or interesting. This particular location is very clean and upkept and the staff are very kind and helpful. Also, we went for story time one morning and we received $4 coupons for lunch which was unexpected.
A toy store more than book store
Awesome store, great team members and Rajesh Starbucks manager is a wonderful person.  Always helping others and is super friendly.  Thank you Raj
All the books you love at one place and if you cant find a book you are looking for the staff is so helpful and they find it quickly for you.
They make shopping quick and efficient if you're looking to get in and get out by having their store set up so nice, and so clean.
It's great!
Great one...
i honestly go here to buy Rubik's cube spinoffs from meffert's.
Good variety

Have been coming here for a long time since I live nearby. This store always has the book I am looking for and more, because I end up leaving with what I came for and a gem I found accidentally while browsing.  Employees here are also very helpful, recently one person took the time to search the store for a book that was in stock but out of its place.
Excellent atmosphere relax and leisurely browse books and magazine. Great cafe and overall customer service. Check out line can be long at times.
Still pricey for alot of books.
Good place to buy more books
Best book store. Got great books at discounted prices.
Love this store! Great place for gifts intelligent conversation tutoring events ect!!!!
Great bookstore.

I love B & N. Not only do I love their selection of books, games, cards, toys, etc., their coffee bar is fantastic! It's a great central place to meet with friends to catch up, study, read. I highly recommend this place!!!
I don't read
always a good time
Lots of accessory items and every book desired
Like the atmosphere but I don't like the prices and they usually have no coupons
Me and my freinds would go there every weekend and have some iced coffee and read some of that good manga.
Nice and close to my home üòÄ Don't have to go to the Mall now. Great selection üëç Good coffee too!!!
Like to visit there to browse get good book and read a while. Then go have dinner
Clean, friendly staff when you can find them not stuck on registers. Register staff is friendly, please don't get me wrong, but it leaves the floor short of people. Art reference severely lacking.
Great place Starbucks side! You can go to find a good book or just to relax maybe play a board game
Well, what can I say? It's the finest of the remaining chain bookstores.
Great experience
No better place to spend an afternoon
Great store. Only complains would be it is freazing cold in there also they don't have enough plugs for people who go there to study and research with computers.
Helpful staff, I found what I needed.

Hola. I went to this Barnes & Noble yesterday and ordered the NCT 127 superhuman album. They did not have it in store so I ordered it online from them then my best friend she went to FYE and she saw that the album was already there. Barnes & Noble are you trying to scam me? I could have the album in my hands right now and bop to it.
Books books books. When I'm surrounded by books I'm in heaven. The staff is friendly and helpful, too.
Great store but pricey bottom line!
Love this place from the service to the aroma , great for adults and kids I love bars and nobles !!!
Always a great store, with so much to offer everyone,  no matter their age !
Typical B&N. Promoted books and magazines lean to the left liberal POV. Kid friendly.

It didn't have what I needed. The clerks tried to help find it.
Interesting selection at this one.  If you are looking for computer books or religious books this is the store.  Otherwise they had a very sparse selection.
Love this location in the Arboretum! It's very large and spacious inside!
Raj, the Manager of the Starbucks in the store, was extremely friendly and helpful. Really made me feel at home.

Multiple collections of books starting from toddlers to grown ups, an awesome place to sit and read and a great snacks n beverages join inside as well... one can have a great time inside Barnes & Noble... feel like 2nd home, the place is full of positive energy,  I'm going to visit it tomorrow again... yay üòç
Nice for a big book store. I usually support small book stores, but was in that area and needed a gift. It worked out great.
A nice place to look for books!
It saddens me that so many bookstores have closed, so glad there is still a local Barnes and Noble in our area.
No I do not want to join Barnes and Noble club. friendly and helpful. convenient location. Always find what I'm looking for
So glad to be able to go into a brick and mortar store to browse books and pick something off the shelf. Customer service is very helpful and eager to please.
smaller them most but well taken care of
Enjoy the array of different cook books they have
Great book store!
As always I like the environment and service
I love this store. In addition to great reading material I found an awesome Internet Website ID and Password book. Thank you Barnes and Noble!!
Quiet and clean
It's a bookstore.
Always friendly staff. Good for relaxing.
Typical Barnes and Noble. Limited selection, high prices, and poor customer service.
Typical chain bookstore. Enjoy while they last.
Very nice B&N
So glad we still have Barnes and Noble in our area.  So few bookstores nowadays.  Love the selection of books.
Love this bookstore!!! It's so much more than books too!!! Journals, lettering pens, etc.
Great service
I like to read maybe our president should try it
We enjoy going to pick out books here, the staff is knowledgeable, esp about kids books! Also love the cafe here!
Great place to hang out, grab coffee, and check out some reads
I enjoy the selection it's great for tutoring relaxing reading and meetings groups etc staff very helpful
Because who doesn't like Barnes & Noble. They didn't have two books my son wanted, but all's forgiven!

Since deciding to revive my childhood love of reading in the summer of 2018, I also decided to support a "local" bookstore, too, rather than always ordering from Amazon.  Yes, I know it's a national chain, but I don't know of any truly independent bookstores in the area, so this is what we have.  The people working there are always very friendly and helpful, which is great, because I'm terrible at finding the books that I want.  My wife, 12yo daughter, and I often enjoy spending time together there, reading our new books in the Starbucks.
I love Barnes & Noble. This particular location has lots of friendly people working there.
Great place for kids to read and socialize.
Found all 7 books of Harry Potter
I really like this location, the store is well organized.
Excellent place to sit around, relax and read.  Also grab you a cup of coffee from Starbucks inside.  I recommended!

Absolutely love this Barnes & Noble. All of them in Charlotte are great but my favorite two are definitely this one and the one at the Pineville mall. Both have an awesome selection of books and wonderful staff always willing to help you out.

A really nice, though older location. The shopping center can be a little bit of a mess with congestion at times, especially at entrances and exits during busier times. It's no fault of this store, but the mess sometimes makes me decide to go elsewhere or shop online if I can wait. The employees are always helpful, and it's nice to have a B&N in this area of town.
Classic Barnes & Noble well stocked and helpful employees
